description: This file defines a NotificationService class that provides methods for managing notifications, including fetching, updating, deleting, and subscribing to real-time updates via WebSocket. It acts as an API client wrapper for notification-related endpoints.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: A service class providing methods to interact with notification-related API endpoints, including CRUD operations, settings management, and WebSocket subscription for real-time updates.

methods.name: getNotifications
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of notifications with optional filters.

methods.name: getNotification
methods.description: Retrieves a specific notification by its ID.

methods.name: markAsRead
methods.description: Marks a specific notification as read.

methods.name: markAsUnread
methods.description: Marks a specific notification as unread.

methods.name: markAllAsRead
methods.description: Marks all notifications as read for the current user.

methods.name: deleteAllRead
methods.description: Deletes all read notifications for the current user.

methods.name: getUnreadCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of unread notifications.

methods.name: getNotificationSettings
methods.description: Fetches notification preferences for the current user.

methods.name: updateNotificationSettings
methods.description: Updates notification preferences for the current user.

methods.name: subscribeToUpdates
methods.description: Subscribes to real-time notification updates via WebSocket.

methods.name: executeNotificationAction
methods.description: Executes an action associated with a notification.
